  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, androidx.appcompat.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatCallback, androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, androidx.core.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, androidx.core.view.KeyEventDispatcher.Component, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner

    public class Play
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    This Class is for second screen of the game such that we play the game in this screen. This class contains all code to play the game.

      • initializeBoard

        public void initializeBoard()
        This method is to fill board array and solution array with buttons that is created by programmatically. Also in this class we set the properties of each button such as block number,image etc. Lastly after initialization we call the shuffle method to shuffle board array according to difficulty mode.

      • checkGame

        public void checkGame()
        Check the game over or not. if game over,then give a message to the gamer.

      • print

        public void print()
        Put buttons on grid layout properly.

      • setSpace

        public void setSpace()
        Set margin of the buttons by using size and some calculations.

      • move

        public char move(Blocks key)
        Move the button which is given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        key - button that will be moved.

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffle board array according to difficulty mode.

      • moveRandom

        public void moveRandom(int howMany)
        To shuffle board array move Randomly.

      • getPossibleMove

        public void getPossibleMove(char[] direction)
        Get the possible directions where empty block can go.
        Parameters:
        direction - directions where empty block can go.

      • getBlock

        public Blocks getBlock(int keyID)
        Return one block according to given key parameter.
        Parameters:
        keyID - block number such as 1,3,5,61 etc.

      • moveByDirection

        public void moveByDirection(char direction)
        Move the button according to given direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - direction that empty block will be moved.

      • is_solved

        public boolean is_solved()
        Check whether game over. To do this it uses solution array

      • playRealTime

        public void playRealTime()
        Start the game and print board on the screen.

      • intelligentMove

        public void intelligentMove()
        Make an intelligent move to help gamer. Hint button uses this method.

      • calculateManhattanOfOneTile

        public int calculateManhattanOfOneTile(Blocks tile)
        Find manhattan distance of given block as parameter. Manhattan distance is distance from current position to original position in solution puzzle.
        Parameters:
        tile - Block that will be calculated it's manhattan distance

      • absoluteValue

        public int absoluteValue(int value)
        Get the absolute value of the given number as parameter.

      • getPictureID

        public int getPictureID(int key)
        Get picture id of the given key as parameter. This method will be used when determine picture of buttons.
